label.description: The label that will be displayed for this item when making a selection.

value.description: The value that the field will assume when this item is selected.

searchableText.description: Any text or keywords that should allow this item to be found when performing a text search.

icon.description: The alias or code for an icon in an icon set that could be displayed together with the label for this item.

iconLibrary.description: The code used to identify the icon set that the specified icon belongs to.

properties.description: An optional list of properties that can contain any relevant meta information about this item.
